summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1249, for the improvement of 38th Avenue North from East Prospect Street to East Blaine Street, and East Highland Drive from 37th Avenue North to the east line of 39th Avenue North, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 13713 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
